languages.text: "Пытаешься отвадить меня, законник? Не выйдет. Между холодом разума и жаром живого сердца выбор прост".

traits.locale_text: "Пытаешься отвадить меня, законник? Не выйдет. Между холодом разума и жаром живого сердца выбор прост".

languages.text: "Trying to scare me off, are you, lawman? That's too bad. You see, between the coldness of the mind and the heat of a living heart, the choice is simple."
languages.original_text: "Пытаешься отвадить меня, законник? Не выйдет. Между холодом разума и жаром живого сердца выбор прост".

traits.locale_text: "Trying to scare me off, are you, lawman? That is too bad. You see, between the coldness of the mind and the heat of a living heart, the choice is simple."
"Trying to scare me off, are you, lawman? That is too bad. You see, between the coldness of the mind and the heat of a living heart, the choice is simple."
"Trying to scare me off, are you, lawman? That is too bad. You see, between the coldness of the mind and the heat of a living heart, the choice is simple."
"Trying to scare me off, are you, lawman? That is too bad. You see, between the coldness of the mind and the heat of a living heart, the choice is simple."
"Trying to scare me off, are you, lawman? That's too bad. You see, between the coldness of the mind and the heat of a living heart, the choice is simple."
"Trying to scare me off, are you, lawman? That's too bad. You see, between the coldness of the mind and the heat of a living heart, the choice is simple."

languages.text: 「アタシを脅して追い払うつもり？法執行官。残念だわ。いい？冷えきった理性と、熱く脈打つ生きた心。そのどちらを選ぶかなんて明白よ」
languages.original_text: "Trying to scare me off, are you, lawman? That's too bad. You see, between the coldness of the mind and the heat of a living heart, the choice is simple."

traits.locale_text: 「アタシを脅して追い払うつもり？法執行官。残念だわ。いい？冷えきった理性と、熱く脈打つ生きた心。そのどちらを選ぶかなんて明白よ」

languages.text: "Wollt Ihr mich abschrecken, Gesetzeshüter? Ein Jammer. Wisst Ihr, die Wahl zwischen der Kälte des Verstands und der Hitze eines lebenden Herzens ist leicht."
languages.original_text: "Trying to scare me off, are you, lawman? That's too bad. You see, between the coldness of the mind and the heat of a living heart, the choice is simple."

traits.locale_text: "Wollt Ihr mich abschrecken, Gesetzeshüter? Ein Jammer. Wisst Ihr, die Wahl zwischen der Kälte des Verstands und der Hitze eines lebenden Herzens ist leicht."

languages.text: « Vous essayez de m'intimider, monsieur le représentant de la loi ? Dommage pour vous. Vous voyez, entre la froideur de l'esprit et la chaleur d'un cœur battant, le choix est simple. »
languages.original_text: "Trying to scare me off, are you, lawman? That's too bad. You see, between the coldness of the mind and the heat of a living heart, the choice is simple."

traits.locale_text: « Vous essayez de m'intimider, monsieur le représentant de la loi ? Dommage pour vous. Vous voyez, entre la froideur de l'esprit et la chaleur d'un cœur battant, le choix est simple. »

languages.text: «¿Pretende asustarme, jurista? Es una pena. Verá, entre la frialdad de la mente y el calor de un corazón vivo, la elección es muy sencilla».
languages.original_text: "Trying to scare me off, are you, lawman? That's too bad. You see, between the coldness of the mind and the heat of a living heart, the choice is simple."

traits.locale_text: «¿Pretende asustarme, jurista? Es una pena. Verá, entre la frialdad de la mente y el calor de un corazón vivo, la elección es muy sencilla».

languages.text: “你是打算把我吓跑吗，法务官？这可太糟糕了。你扪心自问，是选择冰冷的头脑，还是选择炽热的心灵？答案一目了然。”
languages.original_text: "Trying to scare me off, are you, lawman? That's too bad. You see, between the coldness of the mind and the heat of a living heart, the choice is simple."

traits.locale_text: “你是打算把我吓跑吗，法务官？这可太糟糕了。你扪心自问，是选择冰冷的头脑，还是选择炽热的心灵？答案一目了然。”

languages.text: "Gözümü korkutmaya mı çalışıyorsun kanuncu? Çok yazık. Buz gibi mantık ile kalbi saran ateş arasında seçim yapmak çok kolay."
languages.original_text: "Trying to scare me off, are you, lawman? That's too bad. You see, between the coldness of the mind and the heat of a living heart, the choice is simple."

traits.locale_text: "Gözümü korkutmaya mı çalışıyorsun kanuncu? Çok yazık. Buz gibi mantık ile kalbi saran ateş arasında seçim yapmak çok kolay."

languages.original_text: "Trying to scare me off, are you, lawman? That is too bad. You see, between the coldness of the mind and the heat of a living heart, the choice is simple."
